column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I hadn't eaten since early morning and we were out all day
column2: so I was so hungry when I got there. To watch my husband eat a meal while I waited
column3: was tough. I didn't eat until after 7 pm. I never fault a restaurant for not being gluten free friendly
column4: but I DO fault a restaurant for saying they take every precaution and not to worry
column5: then find out that they take none. If I had eaten that pizza
column6: I'd have been so sick . Â
